subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis, back at Fenway Park on Monday as a member of the White Sox, was never a controversial figure for the Red Sox, not until the end, and even then, reluctantly.
snippet: Kevin Youkilis, back at Fenway Park on Monday as a member of the White Sox, was never a controversial figure for the Red Sox, not until the end, and even then, reluctantly.
